synopsis.text: Despite enjoying his independent high school life, Shintaro Tokumitsu's world turns upside down when he stumbles upon an otherworldly girl named Towa on his balcony. The sweet and innocent Towa, who claims to be an angel sent to study humans, captivates Shintaro's curiosity. As he reluctantly agrees to let her stay, Shintaro's once ordinary life becomes filled with delightful chaos and heavenly hijinks. Prepare for a heartwarming and comedic tale as Shintaro navigates his new life with his divine roommate, Towa.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
